page.title: 10THE OLD RECTORY:Hotel
page.content: Once the rectory of Claughton church the present owners,Mr.and Mrs.Percival bought it in 1982 as a hotel and rest- aurant.There are 8 double bedrooms,all with a private bathroom or shower.The new ones have jacuzzi baths.All have colour T/Vs,tea and coffee making facilites.Double bed and breakfast costs 37.50 pounds each and single 27.50.The dining room,bar and sitting room are in regency style. The conser- vatory provides additional accomodation to the bar and dining room.Lunch is only served for bookings of more than ten.Evening meals are served to residents and non-residents.4 extensive Table d' Hote menus alternate every two weeks.A five course meal costs 12.85 pounds.The restaurant caters for functions eg.25 weddings in 1985.A marquee on the rear lawn is erected for bigger wedding receptions.
